solution_line_template: The number of people who took only wine is the difference between the number of people who took wine and those who took wine and soda which is {wine} -{both} = <<{wine}-{both}={wine_only}>>{wine_only} people
In the same manner, the number of people who took only soda is {soda}-{both} = <<{soda}-{both}={soda_only}>>{soda_only} people

Therefore the total number present is the sum of those who took wine only, those who took soda only and those who took both which is {wine_only}+{soda_only}+{both} = <<{wine_only}+{soda_only}+{both}={total_people}>>{total_people} people
